answers.answer: Mine was high yesterday but hasn't consistently been high- do you mean in instances like preeclampsia?
Mines have. Im trying to control it before i do end up with pre eclampsia. Its been above 130/80 for 3months but never over 160/90 . Its just 155/90 or 157/90 still too high :(

I havd ever since I got pregnant if its really to high call your doctor and make sure he checks u high blood pressure can cause problems to both of yu also try not to get worked up to much be and stay calm as much as u can you and the babies health is the most important thing..
Yes it can happen just like you can get Gestational Diabetes you can also get Gestational Hypertension and it will go away after birth.
My blood pressure is higher with my pregnancy

question: Has anyone experienced high blood pressure after becoming pregnant?
title: high blood pressure
